front.title: Management of Precision Network Slicing - Problem Statement

abstract.t: This document introduces Precision Network Slicing Management problems and their context. It represents an initial review of the Management of Network Slicing problem statement derived from the analysis of the technical gaps in IETF protocols ecosystem. It complements and brings together the efforts being carried out in several other IETF working groups covering certain aspects of Network Slicing management functions and operations.
